arts.ttl: Saibari strikes for PSV to force Leverkusen into stalemate
arts.sum: Christian Kofane thought he had given the Rhinelanders the win until Ismael Saibari netted an equaliser.

arts.ttl: Why Bayer Leverkusen will beat PSV Eindhoven in the UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: After an up-and-down season so far, unbeaten Bayer Leverkusen head coach Kasper Hjulmand can be cautiously optimistic of inspiring the side to a UEFA Champions League home win over PSV Eindhoven on the second matchday of the league phase. The Werkself won five out of six home encounters on the way to the 2024 UEFA Europa League final, and followed that up with a flawless record in Leverkusen in last season's Champions League group stage - four wins in four and not a single goal conceded.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs. PSV Eindhoven: UEFA Champions League LIVE blog and team news
arts.sum: Grimaldo's goal in the 2-2 draw in Copenhagen was his third for Leverkusen in the Champions League - his first came against Dutch opposition in a 4-0 win at Feyenoord last season. Having drawn their opening UEFA Champions League fixture against Copenhagen, Bayer Leverkusen are out to get all three points when they host PSV Eindhoven on Wednesday night (kick-off 9pm CEST).

arts.ttl: PSV hoping to get Champions League campaign going against stuttering Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: PSV will be in Germany on Wednesday night hoping to put their opening day Champions League defeat to Union St Gilloise behind them. They will be in the industrial regionâ€¦
